<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
HEALTHCARE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/16/fda-authorizes-salivabased-covid19-test?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
And the 2020 NBA MVP Is...
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Pic from the NBA bubble" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTA4L3BpY19mcm9tX3RoZV9uYmFfYnViYmxlLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">...Yale? This weekend, the FDA <a href="https://news.yale.edu/2020/08/15/yales-rapid-covid-19-saliva-test-receives-fda-emergency-use-authorization?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">granted emergency use authorization</a> to a saliva-based COVID-19 test, called SalivaDirect, developed by the Yale School of Public Health.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Why this one's a BFD: </strong></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Spitting in a tube is much less invasive than swabbing the cavernous depths of your sinuses.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Tests are expected to cost <$20 (the leading saliva test can surpass $100+).</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Labs can source tools from multiple vendors, decreasing risks of supply chain clogs.</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The NBA ran point</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This spring, Yale partnered with the NBA to see how the SalivaDirect test compared to alternatives. The league and its players' union <a href="https://www.espn.com/nba/story/_/id/29667299/fda-allowing-saliva-based-test-funded-nba?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">threw in</a> over $500,000 to help fund the project.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">NBA players aren't exactly average human specimens, but the league's bubble in Orlando is as controlled an environment as researchers can hope for.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>For the last two months, players have been taking three COVID-19 tests: a nose swab, mouth swab, and SalivaDirect.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>"There is almost nobody in the world being tested so often and in so many ways as NBA players," the </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/the-fda-authorizes-a-cheap-fast-saliva-testand-the-nba-is-involved-11597508654?mod=hp_lead_pos5&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">WSJ writes</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The results? </strong>SalivaDirect was just as effective as the other tests. But with the NBA bubble *knocks on wood* still COVID-free, the researchers need to see how SalivaDirect performs rooting out asymptomatic carriers elsewhere.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">We aren't acing this test</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The number of new U.S. cases has been <a href="https://www.usnews.com/news/national-news/articles/2020-08-14/nationwide-coronavirus-cases-are-down-but-so-is-testing?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">declining</a>...but so has testing. Labs have acknowledged crushing demand is causing delays.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">For results to be meaningful, patients need them within three days. But almost 40% take longer than that, according to a <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/15/forty-percent-of-us-covid-19-tests-come-back-too-late-to-be-clinically-meaningful-data-show.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">CNBC and Dynata survey</a> of 9,400 Americans.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Harvard prof. Ashish Jha told CNBC that after 48 hours, contract tracing windows have closed. "Beyond 72 hours, the test is close to useless."</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Some public health experts think a national testing strategy could reduce delays, as states with excess capacity could help those running behind. Bill Gates <a href="https://www.foxbusiness.com/lifestyle/bill-gates-coronavirus-test-reimbursement?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">suggested</a> a government reimbursement system for healthcare companies that crunch results within 24 hours. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture:</strong> As schools, offices, and events prepare to resume, fast, easy-to-use, and cheap COVID-19 testing is needed.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
2020
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/16/house-dems-call-emergency-hearing-usps?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
USPS SOS
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="USPS protest" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTA5L3VzcHNfcHJvdGVzdC5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Michael A. McCoy/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, Democratic leaders said they'll <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/congress/democrats-set-emergency-hearing-top-postal-officials-amid-fear-over-n1236886?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">schedule</a> an emergency House Oversight Committee hearing next Monday to discuss recent changes to the U.S. Postal Service and implications for the upcoming election. They asked recently installed Postmaster General Louis DeJoy and USPS board chair, Michael Duncan, to testify. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The announcement punctuated a weekend during which mail delivery was the No. 1 topic of conversation. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://www.oregonlive.com/news/2020/08/usps-removes-mailboxes-in-portland-and-eugene-cites-declining-mail-volume.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Photos</a></span><span> </span><span><a href="https://nbcmontana.com/news/local/dozens-of-montana-usps-drop-boxes-removed?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">went</a></span><span> </span><span><a href="https://twitter.com/jewell_jan/status/1294523051116118016?s=20&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">viral</a></span><span> of mailboxes being removed across the U.S. An agency spokesperson said it’s part of routine operations, but they'll </span><span><a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/08/14/people-are-freaking-out-about-mailbox-removals-postal-service-says-its-routine/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">pause</a></span><span> anyway until after the election.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Protestors gathered outside DeJoy’s condo in D.C. to criticize his recent </span><span><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/13/trump-says-opposes-usps-funding-block-mailin-voting-expansion?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">cost-cutting initiatives</a></span><span>. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>The pandemic and DeJoy’s changes have exacerbated mail delays across the country. Last month, the Postal Service <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/md-politics/usps-states-delayed-mail-in-ballots/2020/08/14/64bf3c3c-dcc7-11ea-8051-d5f887d73381_story.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">told</a> 46 states that it can't guarantee all mail-in ballots would arrive in time to be counted.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>If primaries are any indication, four postal districts serving battleground states </span><span><a href="https://www.npr.org/2020/08/16/902604303/postal-delays-errors-in-swing-states-loom-over-election?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">failed</a></span><span> to meet service goals for first-class mail between April and June.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>Congress is on recess until September, but they're booking flights back to D.C. earlier than anticipated. Last night, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi <a href="https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/81620-0?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">called</a> on the House to return later this week to take action and "save the Postal Service." </p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Huge protests <a href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-53795871?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">continued</a> in Minsk, Belarus, over last week's alleged rigged election and violent police crackdowns on demonstrators in the days that followed. This weekend, Russia pledged national security assistance to President Aleksandr Lukashenko and the EU moved toward <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2020/aug/14/eu-considers-sanctions-after-crackdown-on-protests-in-belarus?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">putting sanctions</a> on his regime. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><img src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTA2L3JhbmNoX2ZpcmVfYnVybnNfZWFzdF9vZi5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24ifQ==" class="img-responsive" width="640" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 640px; width: 100%;" alt="" data-reactroot=""></p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">It’s been a <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-15/as-california-grid-buckles-region-faces-worst-heat-in-70-years?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">brutally hot</a> two weeks in California, where at least 11 major fires are burning and the pandemic + heat wave combo is straining the power grid. The state imposed rolling blackouts for the first time since 2001.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><img src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTEwL2l0YWxpYW5fY3J1aXNlX3NoaXAuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIn0=" class="img-responsive" width="640" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 640px; width: 100%;" alt="" data-reactroot=""></p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 22px;">The cruise ship MSC Grandiosa <a href="https://apnews.com/cb6930bfb1fab5d462c77f2e6a442de0?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">departed</a> the port of Genoa, Italy, yesterday in what the company says is the first Mediterranean cruise since Italy's lockdown in March.  </p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">

</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Perhaps you’re perusing this newsletter at the breakfast table, sipping coffee. <tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
2020
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/16/dnc-kicks-off-virtually?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Run-DNC
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="A sign advertises the convention at Wisconsin Center, home to the 2020 Democratic National Convention in Milwaukee" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTA3L2RuYy5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Bryan R. Smith/AFP via Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The Democratic National Convention begins today and, in true pandemic form, it'll be smaller, later, and a lot more virtual than initially planned. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The DNC had been scheduled to take Milwaukee by storm in July, but now, according to the party, it'll feature "both live and curated content originating from Milwaukee and other satellite cities, locations, and landmarks across the country" from 9–11pm ET each night. The event will culminate on Thursday when Joe Biden accepts the nomination for president.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Tonight's speakers include Michelle Obama, Sen. Bernie Sanders, and former Ohio Governor John Kasich (a Republican). </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>You can see the full lineup </span><span><a href="https://www.npr.org/2020/08/15/902507449/the-democratic-national-convention-starts-monday-heres-what-you-need-to-know?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">here</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>With the election less than three months away, it'll start to play a <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-stocks-weekahead/wall-street-week-ahead-biden-victory-disputed-election-wall-street-prices-in-november-outcomes-idUSKCN25A2MM?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">bigger role</a> in investors' decisions. Elections always create more uncertainty for the markets, but President Trump's attacks on mail-in voting and the possibility of a drawn-out result could lead to more volatility than usual. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In the latest NBC News/WSJ poll out yesterday, Biden leads Trump by <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/meet-the-press/biden-remains-ahead-trump-nationally-eve-conventions-nbc-news-wsj-n1236873?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">nine points</a> nationally.</p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
FROM THE CREW
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="#" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Start Talking
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><em>On Mondays, we present some of the most pressing business topics of the day, give you a few balanced resources, and encourage you to read and discuss with friends, family, and coworkers. </em></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Today’s topic: </strong>Kamala Harris (pronounced comma-la), Joe Biden’s pick to fill his old gig as VP. A former California attorney general and sitting U.S. senator, Harris has an impressive resume that reminds us why we wouldn’t have cut it in law school. Let’s get to know her and see where she stands on business issues. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>55 things you should know about Kamala Harris (</span><span><a href="https://www.politico.com/news/magazine/2020/08/11/kamala-harris-vp-background-bio-biden-running-mate-2020-393885?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Politico</a></span><span>)</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Her controversial record on criminal justice, explained (</span><span><a href="https://www.vox.com/future-perfect/2019/1/23/18184192/kamala-harris-president-campaign-criminal-justice-record?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Vox</a></span><span>)</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Harris’s stances on the </span><span><a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/business/economy/kamala-harris-economic-policy-roll-back-tax-cuts-expand-health-n1236584?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">economy and taxes</a></span><span> and </span><span><a href="https://www.fastcompany.com/90539157/heres-where-vp-pick-kamala-harris-stands-on-big-tech-family-leave-gender-inequality-and-more?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">workplace issues </a></span><span>
</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>She has a complicated relationship with </span><span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/01/26/kamala-harris-has-complicated-history-with-wall-street.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Wall Street</a></span><span> but a less complicated one with </span><span><a href="https://qz.com/1892325/kamala-harriss-persistent-history-of-fighting-oil-companies/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">fossil fuel companies</a></span><span> </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Or...maybe it's not that complicated with Wall Street, either. The WSJ wrote "</span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/kamala-harris-has-taken-on-wall-street-wall-street-doesnt-seem-to-mind-11597254609?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Wall Street Sighs in Relief</a></span><span>" following her VP selection. </span>
</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr>

</th>

style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0\"\u003e\nHEALTHCARE\n\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003ch1 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nAnd the 2020 NBA MVP Is...\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"Pic from the NBA bubble\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTA4L3BpY19mcm9tX3RoZV9uYmFfYnViYmxlLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eKevin C. Cox/Getty Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e...Yale? This weekend, the FDA \u003ca href=\"https://news.yale.edu/2020/08/15/yales-rapid-covid-19-saliva-test-receives-fda-emergency-use-authorization?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003egranted emergency use authorization\u003c/a\u003e to a saliva-based COVID-19 test, called SalivaDirect, developed by the Yale School of Public Health.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhy this one's a BFD: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSpitting in a tube is much less invasive than swabbing the cavernous depths of your sinuses.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eTests are expected to cost \u003c$20 (the leading saliva test can surpass $100+).\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eLabs can source tools from multiple vendors, decreasing risks of supply chain clogs.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThe NBA ran point\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThis spring, Yale partnered with the NBA to see how the SalivaDirect test compared to alternatives. The league and its players' union \u003ca href=\"https://www.espn.com/nba/story/_/id/29667299/fda-allowing-saliva-based-test-funded-nba?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ethrew in\u003c/a\u003e over $500,000 to help fund the project.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eNBA players aren't exactly average human specimens, but the league's bubble in Orlando is as controlled an environment as researchers can hope for.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eFor the last two months, players have been taking three COVID-19 tests: a nose swab, mouth swab, and SalivaDirect.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\"There is almost nobody in the world being tested so often and in so many ways as NBA players,\" the \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/the-fda-authorizes-a-cheap-fast-saliva-testand-the-nba-is-involved-11597508654?mod=hp_lead_pos5\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eWSJ writes\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe results? \u003c/strong\u003eSalivaDirect was just as effective as the other tests. But with the NBA bubble *knocks on wood* still COVID-free, the researchers need to see how SalivaDirect performs rooting out asymptomatic carriers elsewhere.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWe aren't acing this test\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe number of new U.S. cases has been \u003ca href=\"https://www.usnews.com/news/national-news/articles/2020-08-14/nationwide-coronavirus-cases-are-down-but-so-is-testing?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edeclining\u003c/a\u003e...but so has testing. Labs have acknowledged crushing demand is causing delays.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eFor results to be meaningful, patients need them within three days. But almost 40% take longer than that, according to a \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/15/forty-percent-of-us-covid-19-tests-come-back-too-late-to-be-clinically-meaningful-data-show.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eCNBC and Dynata survey\u003c/a\u003e of 9,400 Americans.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eHarvard prof. Ashish Jha told CNBC that after 48 hours, contract tracing windows have closed. \"Beyond 72 hours, the test is close to useless.\"\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSome public health experts think a national testing strategy could reduce delays, as states with excess capacity could help those running behind. Bill Gates \u003ca href=\"https://www.foxbusiness.com/lifestyle/bill-gates-coronavirus-test-reimbursement?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esuggested\u003c/a\u003e a government reimbursement system for healthcare companies that crunch results within 24 hours. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBig picture:\u003c/strong\u003e As schools, offices, and events prepare to resume, fast, easy-to-use, and cheap COVID-19 testing is needed.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-top: 12px;\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2020%2F08%2F16%2Ffda-authorizes-salivabased-covid19-test\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"text-decoration: none;\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"\" style=\"display: inline-block; McCoy/Getty Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eYesterday, Democratic leaders said they'll \u003ca href=\"https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/congress/democrats-set-emergency-hearing-top-postal-officials-amid-fear-over-n1236886?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eschedule\u003c/a\u003e an emergency House Oversight Committee hearing next Monday to discuss recent changes to the U.S. Postal Service and implications for the upcoming election. They asked recently installed Postmaster General Louis DeJoy and USPS board chair, Michael Duncan, to testify. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe announcement punctuated a weekend during which mail delivery was the No. 1 topic of conversation. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul href=\"https://www.oregonlive.com/news/2020/08/usps-removes-mailboxes-in-portland-and-eugene-cites-declining-mail-volume.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ePhotos\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://nbcmontana.com/news/local/dozens-of-montana-usps-drop-boxes-removed?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewent\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/jewell_jan/status/1294523051116118016?s=20\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epause\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e anyway until after the election.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eProtestors gathered outside DeJoy’s condo in D.C. to criticize his recent \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/13/trump-says-opposes-usps-funding-block-mailin-voting-expansion?utm_source=morning_brew\" initiatives\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eThe pandemic and DeJoy’s changes have exacerbated mail delays across the country. Last month, the Postal Service \u003ca href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/md-politics/usps-states-delayed-mail-in-ballots/2020/08/14/64bf3c3c-dcc7-11ea-8051-d5f887d73381_story.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003etold\u003c/a\u003e 46 states that it can't guarantee all mail-in ballots would arrive in time to be counted.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eIf primaries are any indication, four postal districts serving battleground states \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.npr.org/2020/08/16/902604303/postal-delays-errors-in-swing-states-loom-over-election?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efailed\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e to meet service goals for first-class mail between April and June.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eCongress is on recess until September, but they're booking flights back to D.C. earlier than anticipated. Smith/AFP via Getty Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe Democratic National Convention begins today and, in true pandemic form, it'll be smaller, later, and a lot more virtual than initially planned. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe DNC had been scheduled to take Milwaukee by storm in July, but now, according to the party, it'll feature \"both live and curated content originating from Milwaukee and other satellite cities, locations, and landmarks across the country\" from 9–11pm ET each night. The event will culminate on Thursday when Joe Biden accepts the nomination for president.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eTonight's speakers include Michelle Obama, Sen. Bernie Sanders, and former Ohio Governor John Kasich (a Republican). \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eYou can see the full lineup \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.npr.org/2020/08/15/902507449/the-democratic-national-convention-starts-monday-heres-what-you-need-to-know?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehere\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBig picture: \u003c/strong\u003eWith the election less than three months away, it'll start to play a \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-stocks-weekahead/wall-street-week-ahead-biden-victory-disputed-election-wall-street-prices-in-november-outcomes-idUSKCN25A2MM?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebigger role\u003c/a\u003e in investors' decisions.
